{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00413v1", "title": "Counting subgroups of a finite group containing a prescribed subgroup", "summary": "Let $R$ be a finite group, and let $T$ be a subgroup of $R$. We show that
there are at most \[
  7.3722[R:T]^{\frac{\log_2[R:T]}{4}+1.8919} \] subgroups of $R$ containing
$T$.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-05-01T09:21:51Z"}
